```{r, message=FALSE, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tigris)
library(ggthemes)

sanpablo <- read_csv(url("http://justicetechlab.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/eastpaloalto_sst.csv")) 
shapes <- places("ca", class = "sf", cb= TRUE) %>%
  filter(NAME == "San Pablo")

sp_locations <- sanpablo %>%
                              st_as_sf(coords = c("Latitude", "Longitude"), 
                               crs = st_crs(shapes)) 
ggplot(data = shapes) +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = sp_locations) +
  theme_map()

```
